verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Valley of dry bones O hear the word of God You will live again For the breath of God will come (2x){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Still the vision runs It hastens to its time Though it lingers wait It will surely come Though it lingers wait It will surely come{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We walk by faith From the hearing of the word of God How blest are those who do not see And yet believe{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My soul waits for the Lord More than watchmen on the wall Waiting through the night For the coming of the dawn (2x){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Will He find the faith When the Son of Man shall come Will He find enduring faith On the earth Though the bridegroom wait Though the night should be prolonged Jesus will return to reign over all{/lang-eng}
